; Non-perturbative corrections for the
; ATLAS inclusive jet cross sections at sqrts= 13 TeV R=0.4 rapidity bin 0<|Y|<0.5
; default based on the  Pythia8AU2CT10_PYHW tune
; Uncertainty based on pythia8 tunes: 4C MONASH ATLASA14NNPDF ATLASA14MRSTWLO ATLASA14CTEQL1 
; and Herwigpp: default, UEEE5CTEQ6L1_EIGEN UEEE5MRSTSTAR_EIGEN CTEQEE4_EIGEN 
;
; mean: middle of pt bin
; xmin and xmax: minimum and maximum of bin
: npc: Non-perturbative correction
; npc_up and npc_down: uncertainties calculated with different times
; Uncertainties are given in absolute values
;
